summary: The incredible story of two small remote controlled rovers sent by the Soviets to the moon in the 1970's.
cast: Buzz Aldrin|Neil Armstrong|Leonid Brezhnev|Louis Friedman|Yuri Gagarin|Lyndon B. Johnson|John F. Kennedy|Nikita Khrushchev|Sergei P. Korolev|Alexei Kosygin|Alexey Leonov|Sam Rayburn|Chip Roughton
title: Tank on the Moon
